body_html: I suspect misconfiguration in your NV driver. Could you post the output of ‘sudo dmesg’? A fresh reinstall of your NV driver is also recommended. If the problem remains there, please post your installation method and log.
body_text: I suspect misconfiguration in your NV driver. Could you post the output of ‘sudo dmesg’? A fresh reinstall of your NV driver is also recommended. If the problem remains there, please post your installation method and log.
body: I suspect misconfiguration in your NV driver. Could you post the output of ‘sudo dmesg’? A fresh reinstall of your NV driver is also recommended. If the problem remains there, please post your installation method and log.
